allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add extended soup introspection \(RFC-020 compliance\)

New functions for vault object directory:
- soup-stat: detailed object status \(like stat\(1\)\)
- soup-hash: SHA-512 content hash \(RFC-039\)
- soup-releases: release table with signed/archived status
- soup-du: disk usage summary by type
- soup-find: search with type/size/name/signed criteria

Shows correlation between releases, signatures, and archives.
Smalltalk-style object browser for the vault.
EOF
\)")

Bash(for m in sexp crypto-ffi pq-crypto fips wordlist tty-ffi cert capability security keyring vault catalog bloom audit merkle gossip mdns portal fuse-ffi wormhole enroll auto-enroll os ui display inspector info edt forum seal script cyberspace)

Bash(for m in sexp crypto-ffi pq-crypto fips wordlist tty-ffi cert capability security keyring vault catalog bloom audit merkle gossip mdns portal enroll auto-enroll os ui display inspector info edt forum seal script cyberspace)
Bash(for f in crypto-ffi.scm vault.scm audit.scm cert.scm gossip.scm keyring.scm enroll.scm sexp.scm bloom.scm catalog.scm security.scm capability.scm mdns.scm portal.scm forum.scm)
Bash(for f in crypto-ffi vault audit cert gossip keyring enroll sexp bloom catalog security capability mdns portal forum os ui display inspector info)
Bash(for m in os crypto-ffi sexp capability inspector forum display mdns fips audit wordlist bloom catalog keyring portal cert security enroll gossip auto-enroll ui info seal forge filetype edt)
